name: Zombomb
description:
Note: It is highly recommended to play the Windows version or Web full screen.

Zombomb is a Survival Horror Shooter Puzzle game for #GPJam 2022! There is a family trapped inside of the car, help them to get out of the city by solving the puzzle (destroy the obstacles!) and keeping them safe from the zombies.

Move the C4 bombs towards the obstacles to destroy them and free the road for the car.

Controls:

  • Move: Arrows
  • Aim: Mouse
  • Shoot: Left Click
  • Exit Game: Esc

Credits:

  • Aztturiaz - Sprites, Level Design
  • Carlos_7x - Programming, Level Design
